title: Senior Digital Project Manager
content:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Digital Project Manager. As a Senior Digital Project Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing complex digital projects,including digital content, platforms, data, and analytics. You will deliver exceptional results for our clients. You must have agency/consulting experience and a minimum of 5 years of project delivery experience, with proficiency in both Agile and waterfall project delivery methodologies. This is a client-facing, business project management role.
About you:
You are a highly skilled and experienced Senior Digital Project Manager with agency and enterprise experience. You bring over 5 years of project delivery experience to the table, coupled with a deep understanding of both Agile and waterfall project delivery methodologies. You have polished presentation skills and the ability to convey complex information in simple and engaging formats. You are comfortable presenting to clients and creating quality presentation decks. You exhibit an exceptional client-focused approach, going above and beyond to understand clients' strategic goals and deliver high-value solutions. You utilise your expertise to anticipate client needs, provide strategic advice, and foster long-term partnerships based on trust, expertise, and exceptional client service. You have a can-do attitude with the ability to take ownership of tasks in an ambiguous environment. You are a positive contributor to the team environment. You are friendly, approachable, and adaptable. Overall, you’re a helpful and high-performing member of the team!
Responsibilities:

Lead and manage end-to-end digital projects from inception through to project closure.
Lead and manage the Discovery process of scope exploration and coordinating teams and client stakeholders to discover problem statements and features required for project delivery.
Ensure successful project delivery within scope, timeline, and budget constraints.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, developers, content strategists, and quality assurance to drive project execution and ensure project objectives are met.
Review and input into statements of work with clients for project execution ensuring that the statement of work aligns to the quality standards and deliverables we intend to deliver for clients and you are the responsible individual for delivering against our promises in the statement of work.
Develop and manage project plans, defining project scope, goals, deliverables, resources, and timelines.
Act as the main point of contact for clients, building and maintaining strong relationships, understanding their requirements, and effectively communicating project updates and progress.
Apply Agile and waterfall project delivery methodologies as required, adapting to the needs and preferences of clients and stakeholders.
Ensure project risks and issues are identified and managed promptly and effectively, implementing mitigation strategies to minimize potential project impacts.
Monitor project performance, track key performance indicators, and provide regular status reports to stakeholders, including project progress, budget utilisation, and potential risks.
Foster a collaborative and productive team environment, motivating and guiding team members to achieve project goals and meet client expectations.
Conduct project retrospectives to identify lessons learned and areas for improvement, implementing process enhancements and sharing knowledge across the organisation.
Stay updated with industry trends, advancements in content management and customer relationship management, and digital best practices, sharing knowledge and insights with the team and clients.
Ensure adherence to project governance processes, including change management, quality assurance, and documentation standards.
Uphold ethical standards and professional conduct, maintaining confidentiality and acting in the best interests of clients and the organization.
Provide mentorship and guidance to junior project managers, fostering their professional growth and development.
Respond to client Requests for Proposal on behalf of the Delivery capability within Media.Monks, coordinate pitch responses within a cross-functional team, as well as prepare and deliver presentations to clients to secure new work.

Requirements and Qualifications:

Exhibits an exceptional client-focused approach, going above and beyond to understand clients' strategic goals and deliver high-value solutions. Anticipates client needs, provides strategic advice, and fosters long-term partnerships based on trust and exceptional client service.
Bachelor's degree in a relevant field or equivalent practical experience.
Minimum of 5 years of project delivery experience, with a strong track record of successfully managing complex digital projects.
Experience delivering end-to-end digital experiences and cross-skilled deliveries including project planning, discovery, UX, UI, front end development, back end development, and analytics. Delivery of marketing technology projects including campaign initiatives are beneficial.
Agency or consulting experience is desired, with a proven ability to manage multiple client projects simultaneously.
Strong knowledge of Agile and waterfall project delivery methodologies, with the ability to adapt and apply the most appropriate approach based on project requirements.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate with clients, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams.
Exceptional organisational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritise tasks, manage competing priorities, and meet deadlines.
Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a proactive and solution-oriented mindset.
Demonstrated leadership skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire teams to achieve project success.
Relevant certifications such as Project Management Professional (PMP), PRINCE2, and Agile certifications desirable.

#LI-JA3About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
Disclaimer: 


Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy

demographic_questions.description:
At Media.Monks, we believe in fostering an environment where a diversity of perspectives can thrive. We proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building a team that reflects the communities we serve. We welcome and encourage qualified applicants, from all backgrounds, who are excited to contribute to our mission. 

As a step in strengthening our hiring process, we invite you to voluntarily provide information that will help inform and improve our inclusion efforts.

As a reminder, answering this question is entirely voluntary. Your response will remain confidential and intended solely for the purpose of improving our hiring process; and will not, in any way, be associated with your specific application or be used in the hiring decision.

(e.g. Agile / Waterfall etc)

(e.g. Adobe / Salesforce / Google Analytics etc)

What is your expected annual salary? (in AUD)
